title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2025

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: Jackie Healy-Rae, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. 

Jackie Healy-Rae, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be Special Adviser to Michael Healy-Rae, Minister of State at the Department 
of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 29 January 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
24 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [296] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR

FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,
